tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WorkOrders (
    work_order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    due_date DATE,
    assigned_worker VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE production_tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    work_order_id INT,
    task_description TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(20),
    start_date TIMESTAMP,
    completion_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ProductionTasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    work_order_id INT,
    task_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    task_status TEXT,
    start_date DATETIME,
    end_date DATETIME,
    FOREIGN KEY (work_order_id) REFERENCES WorkOrders(work_order_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ProductionLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id INT,
    employee_id INT,
    workstation_id INT,
    start_time DATETIME,
    end_time DATETIME,
    FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES ProductionTasks(task_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES Employees(employee_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (workstation_id) REFERENCES Workstations(workstation_id)
);
